  "summary": "This module supplies simple utilities to coordinate the stopping of a task in Cypress end‑to‑end test scenarios. It leverages Chainlit to emit a status message and uses the time library to introduce a brief pause, providing a synchronous routine that ensures the stop operation completes before the test continues.",
  "business_intent": "Enable automated test scripts to reliably signal and wait for task termination, improving the stability and determinism of Cypress test executions.",
